keyPolicies.policyDescription: Katherine Barbour is an active campaigner for the NHS. Across Wessex, she supported over 150 GP surgeries to become dementia friendly.
Katherine is campaigning to prevent the airport expansion, which will have negative outcomes for the citizens of Southampton.

Katherine is a firm believer in real democracy through proportional representation; a cleaner, brighter future through investment in renewable energies and public transport; free education and healthcare for all; and fair wages in a fair economy.

issues.environment: Katherine is campaigning to prevent the airport expansion, which will have negative outcomes for the citizens of Southampton.
issues.governance: Katherine is a firm believer in real democracy through proportional representation.
issues.health: Katherine Barbour is an active campaigner for the NHS. Across Wessex, she supported over 150 GP surgeries to become dementia friendly.

leaflet.personalStatement: Katherine Barbour is an active campaigner for the NHS, air quality and the environment, and against austerity.

politicalExperience.achievements: Understands the importance of healthy ageing for older persons and has a particular interest in those people living with dementia, whether they are in the community or in health settings.

images.caption: Katherine Barbour, Your Green Party Candidate.
